Hey there! This is a test to see if the validation program is working or not. It reads through an XML file and searches for missing fields as well as email addresses and urls that need to be removed. It should detech things like mathuyoung@gmail.com and cause an error but something like a@2. should be alright. Putting a link to www.google.ca should be flagged as well as http://www.cbc.ca as well as ftp://filename just to be safe. Here is hoping it works!
